#summary How to install Sonar
#labels Phase-Deploy

[http://sonarsource.org Sonar] is an open platform to manage code quality.

= Prerequisites =

Configured repository (see [HowTo]).

= Installation =

{{{
paludis -i dev-util/sonar-bin
}}}

The only thing left to do is to start Sonar:
{{{
/etc/init.d/sonar-2.0.1 start
}}}

And, optionally, add it to start at boot:
{{{
rc-update add sonar-2.0.1 default
}}}
